song.title: Weeping Willow Rag
song.info:
(c)basehead/mental design
tracked in about 2 hours with more than a little help from Scott Joplin.. =) the master of ragtime hits hard with this piece. enjoy it! it was a bitch to track. piano samples are from romeo knight/trsi.
greetings to necros, chuckb ,maelcum, majesty, and all you other irc freaks..also to everyone in both klf and mental design.
-bh94-klf/md- -8/25/94-
